title: Opening Keynote - Generative AI: what I learned in the last 3 years
abstract: Is generative AI a fundamental improvement in our day-by-day? Or is it just the cool tech trend which shall pass? Are generative AI assistants useful? Can they make us more productive? Can we trust them? Are developers going to be replaced? In this session Massimo will share his perspective on the new opportunities and new challenges that generative AI is bringing to the table.
